article.description: — David Craig had 18 points and 11 rebounds in Mercer's 60-58 win against Fairfield on Saturday night.
article.headline: Craig's double-double helps Mercer holds off Fairfield 60-58
article.linkText: Craig's double-double helps Mercer holds off Fairfield 60-58
article.story: SAVANNAH, Ga. -- — David Craig had 18 points and 11 rebounds in Mercer's 60-58 win against Fairfield on Saturday night. Shawn Walker scored 16 points while going 7 of 10 from the field, for the Bears (4-3). Luis Hurtado scored nine. Supreme Cook led the Stags (1-5) with 17 points, seven rebounds and two blocks. Jalen Leach scored eight. Caleb Fields had seven points and five assists. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
